title: Timetable changes for V/Line coaches connecting with trains on the Bendigo line
articleContent:
From Sunday 11 July 2021, the weekday timetable for the Daylesford to Woodend and Maryborough to Castlemaine V/Line coach services will change to maintain reliable connections with the adjusted train timetable on the Bendigo line.

Daylesford – Woodend

Maryborough – Castlemaine

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
